name: Top Beauty Salon - Hair and Makeup Parlor Game
name_original: Top Beauty Salon - Hair and Makeup Parlor Game
description:
Welcome to Rebeca’s BRAND NEW beauty salon! Will you help her make her way to the TOP in this amazing time management game? Come and meet Taylor, this HOT SHOT fashion EXPERT that will guide you and Rebeca in your way to owning the GREATEST beauty salon in town!

With a little help from Taylor, be AS FAST and AS TALENTED as you can so all your customers will be PRETTY and SATISFIED! In your salon, only the most meticulous and greatest services will be offered: from AMAZING nail polish to FLAWLESS hair dye, you will use impeccable equipment as hair straightener and roller!

HIGHLIGHTS
💄 Upgrade your salon as your customers PAY YOU for a great job
💄 Make every client happy by serving them FAST and GOOD
💄 Face challenging levels that get more and more complex
💄 Buy improved equipment and make your salon the best!

Will you leave Rebeca by herself? Show all your energy in creating BEAUTY! Come and play!

So much to do, so little time! Tackle these other time management challenges, if you dare:

Hospital Dash - http://bit.ly/HospitalDash - It’s a beautiful day to save lives!
Fat to Fit - http://bit.ly/FattoFit - Time to get in shape!
Gym ‘til Fit - http://bit.ly/GymtilFit - Have your own Gym!



Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.
